TopicTitle: [WIP][1.9.x-1.12.x] Scatterer-atmospheric scattering (0.0838 - 14/08/2022) Scattering improvements, in-game atmo generation and multi-sun support

Articles.Content:
Is there any way I could use scatterer to create a haze? [http://imgur.com/LCWAU9T](http://imgur.com/LCWAU9T)

This just doesn't feel right to me, or look good underneath the near solid cloud layer. In the earlier days, scatterer had too much scattering, and made it look kind of foggy in the distance - is it possible for me to replicate an extreme version of that here?

Getting some very weird visuals with Scatterer. Noticed them in 1.1 at times and they're still there in 1.1.1.

![screenshot102.png](http://captainduckman.com/KSP/screenshot102.png)

So far I've noticed it around the Mun and Minmus, not around Kerbin and Duna. Haven't looked around other bodies yet but this suggests it only affects bodies without an atmosphere.

Log doesn't show anything to indicate an error, but Scatterer is rather chatty.
